mapper.update: update handover set han_end_city = #{hanEndCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, han_now_city = #{hanNowCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, han_state = #{hanState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, han_date = #{hanDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, han_remarks = #{hanRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where han_start_city = #{hanStartCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select han_start_city, han_end_city, han_now_city, han_state, han_date, han_remarks from handover
